sentences.en: Campsites in the New Forest quickly filled up as thousands decided to spend the holiday under canvas.
sentences.cn: 随着成千上万的人决定到户外宿营度假，新福里斯特的野营地很快人满为患。

sentences.en: Commissary wagons with torn canvas covers rocked through the ruts.
sentences.cn: 盖着破帆布的军需车摇摇晃晃地在凌乱的车辙中驶着.

sentences.en: First I applied a blue colour wash to the canvas.
sentences.cn: 我先在画布上涂了一层蓝色水彩。

sentences.en: Golf carts with bright canvas canopies wandered the raingreen fairways.
sentences.cn: 一场雨后显得愈加葱绿的高尔夫球场草地上,散放着一些带有色彩缤纷的帆布华盖的高尔夫小车.

sentences.en: He helped her close the cases up, and then he secured the canvas straps as tight as they would go.
sentences.cn: 他帮她关上箱子，然后将帆布带子尽量系紧。

sentences.en: I will introduce you to some of our family on canvas.
sentences.cn: 我要向你介绍我家一些人的画像.

sentences.en: Several painters were working on a huge piece of canvas which would serve as the scenery.
sentences.cn: 几位画家正在一块用作舞台布景的巨大帆布上作画。

sentences.en: She had recently taken a canvas from the theater and tacked it up on the wall.
sentences.cn: 她最近从剧院拿回一幅油画，用图钉把它钉在了墙上。

sentences.en: She sat down cautiously on the red canvas cushions, knees modestly together.
sentences.cn: 她小心翼翼地在红帆布垫上坐下，膝盖矜持地并拢着。

sentences.en: She was in her studio again, painting onto a large canvas.
sentences.cn: 她又回到了画室，在一张大帆布上作画。

sentences.en: Smith painted an oil painting on the canvas.
sentences.cn: 史密斯在画布上画了一幅油画.

sentences.en: The gallery has a canvas by Paul Cezanne.
sentences.cn: 这个美术馆有一幅保罗·塞尚的油画作品。

sentences.en: The hole was covered  with canvas.
sentences.cn: 这个洞被帆布遮盖住了。

sentences.en: The protecting canvas cover fell away in bits from the framework.
sentences.cn: 作防护用的帆布围罩,从车架上一小块一小块地被扯落下来.

sentences.en: The storm tossed the plane around like a canvas - covered kite.
sentences.cn: 飞机在风暴中摇摇晃晃像个帆布扎的风筝.

sentences.en: The times that people used canvas boat have become history.
sentences.cn: 人们用帆船的时代已成为历史.

phrases.tran_cn: 帆布包，帆布垒包；粗帆布包
(拳击等中)被击倒在地；即将失败
露营：在一个或多个帐篷里

trans.tran_en: strong cloth used to make bags, tents, shoes etc

trans.tran_cn: 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备
